00090 
00091 class BaseKernel
00092 {
00093 public: //-------------------------------------------- constructor / destructor
00094 
00095   BaseKernel() {}
00096   virtual ~BaseKernel() {}
00097 
00098 
00099 public: //-------------------------------------------------- add new properties
00100 
00102 
00104 
00125   template <class T>
00126   void add_property( VPropHandleT<T>& _ph, const std::string& _name="<vprop>")
00127   {
00128     _ph = VPropHandleT<T>( vprops_.add(T(), _name) );
00129     vprops_.resize(n_vertices());
00130   }
00131 
00132   template <class T>
00133   void add_property( HPropHandleT<T>& _ph, const std::string& _name="<hprop>")
00134   {
00135     _ph = HPropHandleT<T>( hprops_.add(T(), _name) );
00136     hprops_.resize(n_halfedges());
00137   }
00138 
00139   template <class T>
00140   void add_property( EPropHandleT<T>& _ph, const std::string& _name="<eprop>")
00141   {
00142     _ph = EPropHandleT<T>( eprops_.add(T(), _name) );
00143     eprops_.resize(n_edges());
00144   }
00145 
00146   template <class T>
00147   void add_property( FPropHandleT<T>& _ph, const std::string& _name="<fprop>")
00148   {
00149     _ph = FPropHandleT<T>( fprops_.add(T(), _name) );
00150     fprops_.resize(n_faces());
00151   }
00152 
00153   template <class T>
00154   void add_property( MPropHandleT<T>& _ph, const std::string& _name="<mprop>")
00155   {
00156     _ph = MPropHandleT<T>( mprops_.add(T(), _name) );
00157     mprops_.resize(1);
00158   }
00159 
00161 
00162 
00163 public: //--------------------------------------------------- remove properties
00164 
00166 
00167 
00175   template <typename T>
00176   void remove_property(VPropHandleT<T>& _ph)
00177   {
00178     if (_ph.is_valid())
00179       vprops_.remove(_ph);
00180     _ph.reset();
00181   }
00182 
00183   template <typename T>
00184   void remove_property(HPropHandleT<T>& _ph)
00185   {
00186     if (_ph.is_valid())
00187       hprops_.remove(_ph);
00188     _ph.reset();
00189   }
00190 
00191   template <typename T>
00192   void remove_property(EPropHandleT<T>& _ph)
00193   {
00194     if (_ph.is_valid())
00195       eprops_.remove(_ph);
00196     _ph.reset();
00197   }
00198 
00199   template <typename T>
00200   void remove_property(FPropHandleT<T>& _ph)
00201   {
00202     if (_ph.is_valid())
00203       fprops_.remove(_ph);
00204     _ph.reset();
00205   }
00206 
00207   template <typename T>
00208   void remove_property(MPropHandleT<T>& _ph)
00209   {
00210     if (_ph.is_valid())
00211       mprops_.remove(_ph);
00212     _ph.reset();
00213   }

00217 public: //------------------------------------------------ get handle from name
00218 
00220 
00221 
00230   template <class T>
00231   bool get_property_handle(VPropHandleT<T>& _ph,
00232          const std::string& _name) const
00233   {
00234     return (_ph = VPropHandleT<T>(vprops_.handle(T(), _name))).is_valid();
00235   }
00236 
00237   template <class T>
00238   bool get_property_handle(HPropHandleT<T>& _ph,
00239          const std::string& _name) const
00240   {
00241     return (_ph = HPropHandleT<T>(hprops_.handle(T(), _name))).is_valid();
00242   }
00243 
00244   template <class T>
00245   bool get_property_handle(EPropHandleT<T>& _ph,
00246          const std::string& _name) const
00247   {
00248     return (_ph = EPropHandleT<T>(eprops_.handle(T(), _name))).is_valid();
00249   }
00250 
00251   template <class T>
00252   bool get_property_handle(FPropHandleT<T>& _ph,
00253          const std::string& _name) const
00254   {
00255     return (_ph = FPropHandleT<T>(fprops_.handle(T(), _name))).is_valid();
00256   }
00257 
00258   template <class T>
00259   bool get_property_handle(MPropHandleT<T>& _ph,
00260          const std::string& _name) const
00261   {
00262     return (_ph = MPropHandleT<T>(mprops_.handle(T(), _name))).is_valid();
00263   }

00271 
00281   template <class T>
00282   PropertyT<T>& property(VPropHandleT<T> _ph) {
00283     return vprops_.property(_ph);
00284   }
00285   template <class T>
00286   const PropertyT<T>& property(VPropHandleT<T> _ph) const {
00287     return vprops_.property(_ph);
00288   }
00289

00292     return hprops_.property(_ph);
00293   }

00296     return hprops_.property(_ph);
00297   }

00301     return eprops_.property(_ph);
00302   }

00305     return eprops_.property(_ph);
00306   }

00309   PropertyT<T>& property(FPropHandleT<T> _ph) {
00310     return fprops_.property(_ph);
00311   }

00314     return fprops_.property(_ph);
00315   }

00318   PropertyT<T>& mproperty(MPropHandleT<T> _ph) {
00319     return mprops_.property(_ph);
00320   }
00321   template <class T>
00322   const PropertyT<T>& mproperty(MPropHandleT<T> _ph) const {
00323     return mprops_.property(_ph);
00324   }

00328 public: //-------------------------------------------- access property elements
00329 
00331 
00332 
00336   template <class T>
00337   typename VPropHandleT<T>::reference
00338   property(VPropHandleT<T> _ph, VertexHandle _vh) {
00339     return vprops_.property(_ph)[_vh.idx()];
00340   }
00341 
00342   template <class T>
00343   typename VPropHandleT<T>::const_reference
00344   property(VPropHandleT<T> _ph, VertexHandle _vh) const {
00345     return vprops_.property(_ph)[_vh.idx()];
00346   }
00347 
00348 
00349   template <class T>
00350   typename HPropHandleT<T>::reference
00351   property(HPropHandleT<T> _ph, HalfedgeHandle _hh) {
00352     return hprops_.property(_ph)[_hh.idx()];
00353   }
00354 
00355   template <class T>
00356   typename HPropHandleT<T>::const_reference
00357   property(HPropHandleT<T> _ph, HalfedgeHandle _hh) const {
00358     return hprops_.property(_ph)[_hh.idx()];
00359   }
00360 
00361 
00362   template <class T>
00363   typename EPropHandleT<T>::reference
00364   property(EPropHandleT<T> _ph, EdgeHandle _eh) {
00365     return eprops_.property(_ph)[_eh.idx()];
00366   }
00367 
00368   template <class T>
00369   typename EPropHandleT<T>::const_reference
00370   property(EPropHandleT<T> _ph, EdgeHandle _eh) const {
00371     return eprops_.property(_ph)[_eh.idx()];
00372   }
00373 
00374 
00375   template <class T>
00376   typename FPropHandleT<T>::reference
00377   property(FPropHandleT<T> _ph, FaceHandle _fh) {
00378     return fprops_.property(_ph)[_fh.idx()];
00379   }
00380 
00381   template <class T>
00382   typename FPropHandleT<T>::const_reference
00383   property(FPropHandleT<T> _ph, FaceHandle _fh) const {
00384     return fprops_.property(_ph)[_fh.idx()];
00385   }
00386 
00387 
00388   template <class T>
00389   typename MPropHandleT<T>::reference
00390   property(MPropHandleT<T> _ph) {
00391     return mprops_.property(_ph)[0];
00392   }
00393 
00394   template <class T>
00395   typename MPropHandleT<T>::const_reference
00396   property(MPropHandleT<T> _ph) const {
00397     return mprops_.property(_ph)[0];
00398   }

00404 public: // used by non-native kernel and MeshIO, should be protected
00405 
00406   size_t n_vprops(void) const { return vprops_.size(); }
00407 
00408   size_t n_eprops(void) const { return eprops_.size(); }
00409 
00410   size_t n_hprops(void) const { return hprops_.size(); }
00411 
00412   size_t n_fprops(void) const { return fprops_.size(); }
00413 
00414   size_t n_mprops(void) const { return mprops_.size(); }
00415 
00416   BaseProperty* _get_vprop( const std::string& _name)
00417   { return vprops_.property(_name); }
00418 
00419   BaseProperty* _get_eprop( const std::string& _name)
00420   { return eprops_.property(_name); }
00421 
00422   BaseProperty* _get_hprop( const std::string& _name)
00423   { return hprops_.property(_name); }
00424

00429   { return mprops_.property(_name); }

00432   { return vprops_.property(_name); }

00435   { return eprops_.property(_name); }
00436

00445 
00446   BaseProperty& _vprop( size_t _idx ) { return vprops_._property( _idx ); }
00447   BaseProperty& _eprop( size_t _idx ) { return eprops_._property( _idx ); }
00448   BaseProperty& _hprop( size_t _idx ) { return hprops_._property( _idx ); }
00449   BaseProperty& _fprop( size_t _idx ) { return fprops_._property( _idx ); }
00450   BaseProperty& _mprop( size_t _idx ) { return mprops_._property( _idx ); }
00451

00453   { return vprops_._property( _idx ); }
00454   const BaseProperty& _eprop( size_t _idx ) const
00455   { return eprops_._property( _idx ); }
00456   const BaseProperty& _hprop( size_t _idx ) const
00457   { return hprops_._property( _idx ); }
00458   const BaseProperty& _fprop( size_t _idx ) const
00459   { return fprops_._property( _idx ); }
00460   const BaseProperty& _mprop( size_t _idx ) const
00461   { return mprops_._property( _idx ); }
00462 
00463   size_t _add_vprop( BaseProperty* _bp ) { return vprops_._add( _bp ); }
00464   size_t _add_eprop( BaseProperty* _bp ) { return eprops_._add( _bp ); }
00465   size_t _add_hprop( BaseProperty* _bp ) { return hprops_._add( _bp ); }
00466   size_t _add_fprop( BaseProperty* _bp ) { return fprops_._add( _bp ); }
00467   size_t _add_mprop( BaseProperty* _bp ) { return mprops_._add( _bp ); }

00470 
00471   BaseProperty& _vprop( BaseHandle _h )
00472   { return vprops_._property( _h.idx() ); }
00473   BaseProperty& _eprop( BaseHandle _h )
00474   { return eprops_._property( _h.idx() ); }
00475   BaseProperty& _hprop( BaseHandle _h )
00476   { return hprops_._property( _h.idx() ); }

00478   { return fprops_._property( _h.idx() ); }

00480   { return mprops_._property( _h.idx() ); }
00481

00483   { return vprops_._property( _h.idx() ); }
00484   const BaseProperty& _eprop( BaseHandle _h ) const
00485   { return eprops_._property( _h.idx() ); }
00486   const BaseProperty& _hprop( BaseHandle _h ) const
00487   { return hprops_._property( _h.idx() ); }
00488   const BaseProperty& _fprop( BaseHandle _h ) const
00489   { return fprops_._property( _h.idx() ); }
00490   const BaseProperty& _mprop( BaseHandle _h ) const
00491   { return mprops_._property( _h.idx() ); }

00494 public: //----------------------------------------------------- element numbers
00495 
00496 
00497   virtual unsigned int n_vertices()  const { return 0; }
00498   virtual unsigned int n_halfedges() const { return 0; }
00499   virtual unsigned int n_edges()     const { return 0; }
00500   virtual unsigned int n_faces()     const { return 0; }

00504 
00505   void vprops_reserve(unsigned int _n) const { vprops_.reserve(_n); }
00506   void vprops_resize(unsigned int _n) const { vprops_.resize(_n); }
00507   void vprops_swap(unsigned int _i0, unsigned int _i1) const {
00508     vprops_.swap(_i0, _i1);
00509   }
00510

00515   }

00547 public:
00548 
00549   typedef PropertyContainer::iterator prop_iterator;
00550   typedef PropertyContainer::const_iterator const_prop_iterator;
00551 
00552   prop_iterator vprops_begin() { return vprops_.begin(); }
00553   prop_iterator vprops_end()   { return vprops_.end(); }
00554   const_prop_iterator vprops_begin() const { return vprops_.begin(); }
00555   const_prop_iterator vprops_end()   const { return vprops_.end(); }
00556 
00557   prop_iterator eprops_begin() { return eprops_.begin(); }
00558   prop_iterator eprops_end()   { return eprops_.end(); }
00559   const_prop_iterator eprops_begin() const { return eprops_.begin(); }
00560   const_prop_iterator eprops_end()   const { return eprops_.end(); }
00561 
00562   prop_iterator hprops_begin() { return hprops_.begin(); }
00563   prop_iterator hprops_end()   { return hprops_.end(); }
00564   const_prop_iterator hprops_begin() const { return hprops_.begin(); }
00565   const_prop_iterator hprops_end()   const { return hprops_.end(); }
00566 
00567   prop_iterator fprops_begin() { return fprops_.begin(); }
00568   prop_iterator fprops_end()   { return fprops_.end(); }
00569   const_prop_iterator fprops_begin() const { return fprops_.begin(); }
00570   const_prop_iterator fprops_end()   const { return fprops_.end(); }
00571 
00572   prop_iterator mprops_begin() { return mprops_.begin(); }
00573   prop_iterator mprops_end()   { return mprops_.end(); }
00574   const_prop_iterator mprops_begin() const { return mprops_.begin(); }
00575   const_prop_iterator mprops_end()   const { return mprops_.end(); }
00576

00578

00582   PropertyContainer  fprops_;
00583   PropertyContainer  mprops_;
